Articles.Content:
Hello all

I\'ve been lurking around since about 0.8 and finally decided to join the forums, donate and get active (not neccisarily in that order)

I\'ve been a massive fan of spaceflight since the year dot, and though I found orbiter too fiddley, I\'m getting the hang of KSP, So much more user friendly.

Things I\'ve achieved so far.

Got to orbit

Got to hoffman transfer orbit to mun

Got into lunar orbit

Landed on mun and back again

tried hard to replicate, they all end in fiery death!

Gave up and brewed mead!

came back, Screwed around with orbital mechanics, finally got the hang of transfering between orbits, both interplanetry and transition to and from polar orbits

Came back and drank said mead, (and most of this was tonight!)

About me: I like to build rockets, and just watch the world burn!

I\'m very patient, AND I WILL GODDAMN TOLERATE EVERYBODY INCLUDING THOSE WHO ARE INTOLERANT AND GENERALLY NASTY ON THESE FORUMS. (you know who you are!)

I am most definitely not a Broney!

Anyway Big Hi to everyone, hope you can make room in the kommunity! 8)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

I am most definitely not a Broney!

I like you already

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Hello all

I am most definitely not a Broney Brony!

I can tell already. But regardless we can love and tolerate! Welcome to the forums!

Welcome! We bronies are everywhere, but you don\'t even notice most of the time

you will be assimilated

BTW,

Arrr!

Capt\'n Pants
England is the most tolerant country, being able to live with so many people we can\'t bloody stand.
